overview:
As Senior Director of Marketing, Lisa Abramson leads Rhythm’s corporate and product marketing, external communications and social media efforts. Lisa is an experienced industry speaker, serving as the company spokesperson. Since joining Rhythm in 2007, Lisa has also been deeply involved with Rhythm’s ad products, helping to shape and define Rhythm’s rich media, display and interactive video ad units. Prior to her work with Rhythm, Lisa managed numerous mobile accounts at Spark PR and Edelman Public Relations. Lisa earned her bachelor’s degree from Vanderbilt University in Nashville, TN.

In 2011, Lisa was named one of the 25 Mobile Women to Watch in 2012, by Mobile Marketer.
